name: Log Tower
description:
Made for the 'GBJAM 10', with the theme of 'Gameboy' and 'Plant/Plants'

PLEASE RATE THE GAME ON THE CLASSIC MODE, AS TOWER MODE IS VERY DIFFICULT

Log Tower is a Donkey Kong "inspired" game, where you have to climb up to a tower and plant a bomb to blow it up, jumping over rolling logs for the whole climb. But watch out once the bomb has been planted, you need to get to safety before it blows up!

Controls:  Move - A,D      Jump - W      Change selection - W,S      Select - Enter

Features 2 modes:

Classic mode is how the game is supposed to be played, and matches the earlier description

Tower mode is a longer and harder version of Classic mode, although backtracking to safety isn't required, because you win as soon as the final bomb is planted

(Score is just an added bonus for competitive players, and is erased at the start of each round)
